description: This trap is generated when authentication fails
on the Registration Reply message.

event.Summary: Registration reply authentication failed due to $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNIRegistrationReplyAuthFailure USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurViolatorAddress a 192.0.2.1 USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurRecentViolationSPI u 9999 USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurRecentViolationIDLow s EXAM USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurRecentViolationIDHigh s EXAM USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurRecentViolationReason i 1

description: Violator's IP address. This address may not
be in the Mobility Security Association table.
variables.name: USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurViolatorAddress

description: SPI of the most recent security violation coming
from this IP address.
variables.name: USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurRecentViolationSPI

description: Low-order 32 bits of identification used in
Registration Reply, Registration Acknowledge
or Registration Update of the most recent security
violation coming from this IP address.
variables.name: USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurRecentViolationIDLow

description: High-order 32 bits of identification used in
Registration Reply, Registration Acknowledge
or Registration Update of the most recent security
violation coming from this IP address.
variables.name: USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurRecentViolationIDHigh

description: Reason for the most recent security violation coming
from this IP address.
variables.name: USR-FCNI-MIB::usrFCNISecurRecentViolationReason

description: This trap is generated when authentication fails
on the Registration Update message.

event.Summary: Registration update authentication failed due to $v5

to PDSN's messages.

this FACN interface shares the mobility security
association.
